# gitlab_project_issue_link (Resource)

The `gitlab_project_issue_link` resource allows to manage the lifecycle of project issue links.

**Upstream API**: [GitLab REST API docs](https://docs.gitlab.com/api/issue_links/)

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Create a project
resource "gitlab_project" "example" {
  name             = "example"
  description      = "An example project"
  visibility_level = "public"
}

# Create source issue
resource "gitlab_project_issue" "source" {
  project = gitlab_project.example.id
  title   = "Source Issue"
}

# Create target issue
resource "gitlab_project_issue" "target" {
  project = gitlab_project.example.id
  title   = "Target Issue"
}

# Link issues with "relates_to" link type (default)
resource "gitlab_project_issue_link" "relates_to" {
  project           = gitlab_project.example.id
  issue_iid         = gitlab_project_issue.source.iid
  target_project_id = gitlab_project.example.id
  target_issue_iid  = gitlab_project_issue.target.iid
  link_type         = "relates_to"
}


# Cross-project linking example
resource "gitlab_project" "other_project" {
  name        = "other_project"
  description = "Another project for cross-project linking"
}

resource "gitlab_project_issue" "cross_target" {
  project = gitlab_project.other_project.id
  title   = "Cross-Project Target Issue"
}

resource "gitlab_project_issue_link" "cross_project_relates_to" {
  project           = gitlab_project.example.id
  issue_iid         = gitlab_project_issue.source.iid
  target_project_id = gitlab_project.other_project.id
  target_issue_iid  = gitlab_project_issue.cross_target.iid
  link_type         = "relates_to"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `issue_iid` (Number) The internal ID of a project's issue.
- `link_type` (String) Type of the relationship. Valid values are `relates_to`, `blocks`, `is_blocked_by`.
- `project` (String) The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.
- `target_issue_iid` (Number) The internal ID of the target issue.
- `target_project_id` (String) The ID or URL-encoded path of the target project.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this Terraform resource. In the format of `<project>:<issue_iid>:<issue_link_id>`.
- `issue_link_id` (Number) ID of an issue relationship.

## Import

Starting in Terraform v1.5.0, you can use an [import block](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/import) to import `gitlab_project_issue_link`. For example:

```terraform
import {
  to = gitlab_project_issue_link.example
  id = "see CLI command below for ID"
}
```

Importing using the CLI is supported with the following syntax:

```shell
# You can import this resource with an id made up of `{project-id}:{source-issue-iid}:{target-issue-iid}`, e.g.
terraform import gitlab_project_issue_link.example 42:1001:1002
```
